definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 後印象派反映了大量與文學象徵主義相似的態度。

sentences.english: Many schools around the country have adopted similar coursework.
sentences.chinese: 全國許多學校創立了相似的課程。

sentences.english: He has a better eye for similarities among cultures than for diversities.
sentences.chinese: 他看各種文化之間的相似點比看其相異點更爲透徹。

sentences.english: A weight in percentage represents the degree of similarity.
sentences.chinese: 百分比形式的權重代表的是相似度。

sentences.english: It is proposed for the concealment of confidential information.
sentences.chinese: 基於相似性的搭載模型是實現信息隱蔽的一般框架。

sentences.english: You read stories about Elijah; similar things are said about him.
sentences.chinese: 你讀關於以利亞的故事，會和這非常相似。

sentences.english: Conclusion Atorvastatin is similar in curative effect and safety to Xuezhikang.
sentences.chinese: 結論血脂康與阿託伐他汀降脂療效與安全性相似。

sentences.english: There are striking resemblances between the twin brothers.
sentences.chinese: 雙胞胎的長相有驚人的相似之處。

sentences.english: The process of embryonic germination was similar to zygotic embryoid but presented some abnormal embryoids.
sentences.chinese: 胚狀體萌發過程與合子胚相似，但出現了一些畸形胚。

sentences.english: You and your woman have more in common than you think.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的女人有很多相似之處，這絕對超過你的想象。

sentences.english: The pathogenesis of this multicentric disorder may be associated with autoimmune disease.
sentences.chinese: 它的多器官受累可能與自身免疫疾病的發病機制相似。

sentences.english: The depictions of the two Zenos are similar; both were tall.
sentences.chinese: 對兩個芝諾的描繪是相似的，他們都同樣高大。

sentences.english: Perhaps much like the stony troggs or dwarves that evolved from the earthen.
sentences.chinese: 這與由土靈演化出矮人與石齶怪非常相似。

sentences.english: In their core, these systems are all very similar.
sentences.chinese: 在他們的核心，這些系統都非常相似。

sentences.english: The setup here is very similar to the parsing of the main document.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的設置與主文檔的語法分析十分相似。

definition: to resemble one another/to be alike/similar
to be precisely the same/to be no different
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
different tunes played with equal skill (idiom)/different methods leading to the same result/different approach but equally satisfactory outcome
to be a good fit/to be identical with/to adjust oneself to/to fit in
not at all the same/substantially different
